title: UPDATE 1-S.Korea coronavirus spread prompts Chinese cities to curb entry by outsiders
description: More Chinese cities close to the Korean Peninsula are imposing travel restrictions on outsiders as the coronavirus spreads rapidly through South Korea.
content:
